sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_workflow_model ( id char(32) not null, modelname varchar2(64 char) not null, modeltext varchar2(128 char), status number(4) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, lastuserid varchar2(32 char), lastupdate timestamp, unique(modelname), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_process ( id char(32) not null, modelid char(32) not null, title varchar2(128 char), status number(4) not null, userid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, roleid char(32), completedate timestamp, properties clob, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_delegation ( id char(32) not null, delegationsource number(4) not null, sourceid char(32) not null, status number(4) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, runningdate timestamp, completedate timestamp, startdate timestamp, enddate timestamp, rulehandler varchar2(128 char), description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id), unique(delegationsource, sourceid, userid) );

create table sf_workflow_activity ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, previousid char(32), tasknodeid char(32) not null, tasknodetype number(4) not null, status number(4) not null, createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, properties clob, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_workitem ( id char(32) not null, activityid char(32) not null, status number(4) not null, roleid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, readmark number(1), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable ( id char(32) not null, variablesource number(4) not null, sourceid char(32) not null, variablename varchar2(32 char) not null, stringvalue varchar2(128 char), clobvalue clob, unique(variablesource, sourceid, variablename), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable_log ( id char(32) not null, variableid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, stringvalue varchar2(128 char), clobvalue clob, primary key(id) );
